field.name: jfupdatedavatars
field.label: Updated avatar only
field.description: Show users with updated avatar only.

field.name: jfusertooltips
field.label: Use Tooltips
field.description: Select to choose whether to show the tooltips or not.

field.name: jfusercount_lim
field.label: User Count
field.description: The number of users to display (default is 10)

field.name: loadjquery
field.label: Load jQuery
field.description: Load 'jQuery' if you dont have on your website (NOTE! if you use our 'JF Social' Template, than you dont need to enable this)

field.name: loadjquery_noconflict
field.label: Load jQuery noConflict
field.description: Load 'jQuery noConflict' mode if you dont have on your website (NOTE! if you use our 'JF Social' Template, than you dont need to enable this)

field.name: loadjquery_easing
field.label: Load jQuery Easing
field.description: Load 'jQuery Easing' feature if you dont have on your website (NOTE! if you use our 'JF Social' Template, than you dont need to enable this)

field.name: jfautoslidedur
field.label: Auto Slide Duration
field.description: Type Auto Slide Duration, Default is 3 seconds (1 second = 1000)

field.name: jfslideuserscount
field.label: Count on 1-st Slide
field.description: Type the number of members which will be shown on first slide, Default is 5
